20110112001058.000|20110112001100.000|TR0|think he was a threat.  There was an issue

20110112001105.000|20110112001107.000|TR0|apartment or a home of a former student.  
20110112001107.000|20110112001110.000|TR0|The former student no longer lived at that 
20110112001110.000|20110112001112.000|TR0|address, but we still haven't found the 
20110112001112.000|20110112001114.000|TR0|nature of that.

20110112001119.000|20110112001122.000|TR0|who is -- just who is Jared Lee Loughner.

20110112001624.000|20110112001627.000|TR0|assessment of her comprehension level, I 
20110112001627.000|20110112001629.000|TR0|guess is the question.
20110112001629.000|20110112001632.000|TR0|
20110112001632.000|20110112001634.000|TR0|FRIESE:  Well when we are assessing a 
20110112001634.000|20110112001636.000|TR0|sedated, critically injured patient we do 
20110112001636.000|20110112001639.000|TR0|so with very simple commands.  We want to 
20110112001639.000|20110112001641.000|TR0|ask the patient to show us two fingers, to 
20110112001641.000|20110112001644.000|TR0|squeeze our hand, to lift up your thumb, 
20110112001644.000|20110112001646.000|TR0|to wiggle your toes.  These are very 
20110112001646.000|20110112001648.000|TR0|simple commands.  All we're testing is 
20110112001648.000|20110112001651.000|TR0|receiving information, processing 
20110112001651.000|20110112001653.000|TR0|information, carrying out the command.  
20110112001653.000|20110112001656.000|TR0|It's not any deeper than that.

20110112001727.000|20110112001730.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  She's improving.  I think 
20110112001730.000|20110112001732.000|TR0|that's the biggest thing.  And you know 
20110112001732.000|20110112001734.000|TR0|breathing on your own is a significant 
20110112001734.000|20110112001737.000|TR0|development.  She may still have the 
20110112001737.000|20110112001739.000|TR0|breathing tube in.  A breathing tube does 
20110112001739.000|20110112001742.000|TR0|lots of things besides actually providing 
20110112001742.000|20110112001744.000|TR0|breaths from a ventilator.  It also helps 
20110112001744.000|20110112001747.000|TR0|protect her airway and helps prevent from 
20110112001747.000|20110112001749.000|TR0|aspirating and possibly causing pneumonia.
20110112001749.000|20110112001751.000|TR0|
20110112001751.000|20110112001754.000|TR0|So despite the fact that the breathing 
20110112001754.000|20110112001756.000|TR0|tube is in, that's a significant 
20110112001756.000|20110112001759.000|TR0|improvement.  And while it may seem a 
20110112001759.000|20110112001801.000|TR0|little counterintuitive when you have a 
20110112001801.000|20110112001803.000|TR0|brain injury from traumatic or otherwise, 
20110112001803.000|20110112001806.000|TR0|you can still have problems in other 
20110112001806.000|20110112001808.000|TR0|organs in your body including the lungs in 
20110112001808.000|20110112001811.000|TR0|the days afterwards.  So the fact that 
20110112001811.000|20110112001813.000|TR0|she's making steps forward certainly is an 
20110112001813.000|20110112001816.000|TR0|improvement.  But one of the things I

20110112001818.000|20110112001820.000|TR0|Friese, you know the idea of being heavily

20110112005625.000|20110112005627.000|TR0|up. Never drive or date.  And it's

20110112005630.000|20110112005632.000|TR0|but at one point you have to stop being 
20110112005632.000|20110112005635.000|TR0|angry, and just start being-trying to look 
20110112005635.000|20110112005637.000|TR0|forward again.       KING:  What do you 
20110112005637.000|20110112005640.000|TR0|think the conversation will be if we sit 
20110112005640.000|20110112005642.000|TR0|down at this table in six months or a 
20110112005642.000|20110112005644.000|TR0|year?  Will it be different?  Whether any 
20110112005644.000|20110112005647.000|TR0|political rhetoric is directly 
20110112005647.000|20110112005649.000|TR0|responsible, or even indirectly 
20110112005649.000|20110112005652.000|TR0|responsible, I think it is a good thing 
20110112005652.000|20110112005654.000|TR0|for all of us when something big happens 
20110112005654.000|20110112005657.000|TR0|to reflect.  And think, OK, how can I be 
20110112005657.000|20110112005659.000|TR0|different?  How can I be better?  If I'm 
20110112005659.000|20110112005701.000|TR0|back here in six months or a year and 
20110112005701.000|20110112005704.000|TR0|we're sitting down, do you think 
20110112005704.000|20110112005706.000|TR0|that--whether it's the politicians, 
20110112005706.000|20110112005709.000|TR0|whether it is talk radio, whether it is 
20110112005709.000|20110112005711.000|TR0|guys like me on cable television, whether 
20110112005711.000|20110112005713.000|TR0|it is you, as individual citizens, will it 
20110112005713.000|20110112005716.000|TR0|be different?
20110112005716.000|20110112005718.000|TR0|
20110112005718.000|20110112005721.000|TR0|PREZELSKI:  Our officials have always been 
20110112005721.000|20110112005723.000|TR0|our friends and neighbors and now suddenly 
20110112005723.000|20110112005726.000|TR0|both our congressmen in Tucson had these 
20110112005726.000|20110112005728.000|TR0|horrible vitriolic campaigns directed at 
20110112005728.000|20110112005730.000|TR0|them.  And it seems to have changed the 
20110112005730.000|20110112005733.000|TR0|whole mood of how we do politics in 
20110112005733.000|20110112005735.000|TR0|Tucson.  And I hope we can work to get 
20110112005735.000|20110112005738.000|TR0|that back because I kind of feel like my 
20110112005738.000|20110112005740.000|TR0|community has been taken from me, in some 
20110112005740.000|20110112005742.000|TR0|ways.
20110112005742.000|20110112005745.000|TR0|
20110112005745.000|20110112005747.000|TR0|KING:  Are you convinced it will get 
20110112005747.000|20110112005750.000|TR0|different, or will people just forget and 
20110112005750.000|20110112005752.000|TR0|move on?
20110112005752.000|20110112005755.000|TR0|
20110112005755.000|20110112005757.000|TR0|SALESE:  Will it change?  I doubt it.  It 
20110112005757.000|20110112005759.000|TR0|will get worse in my opinion, 
20110112005759.000|20110112005802.000|TR0|unfortunately.  Because people don't take 
20110112005802.000|20110112005804.000|TR0|responsibility and there's no

20110112005809.000|20110112005812.000|TR0| It's just a free-for-all.  So, I don't

20110112005816.000|20110112005819.000|TR0|

20110112005821.000|20110112005824.000|TR0|

20110112005826.000|20110112005828.000|TR0|that people put a lot of faith in 
20110112005828.000|20110112005831.000|TR0|government, or organizations, and I feel 
20110112005831.000|20110112005833.000|TR0|that for real change to happen people have

20110112005836.000|20110112005838.000|TR0|defines Tucson to me as a community is 
20110112005838.000|20110112005841.000|TR0|thousands of people who are lighting 
20110112005841.000|20110112005843.000|TR0|candles and putting up signs, and going to 
20110112005843.000|20110112005845.000|TR0|vigils, because that's what I wake up to
